channel.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
channel.description: Hello everyone! I like playing Tomb Raider, So since this is out in some months, I figured we needed a thread for it! So what do you guys think about it? Does it need to be a game filled with a whole lot of mind-boggling puzzles like the previous games or an action game? (It looks like an action game tbh but we'll see).

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Yeah, those VA grunts from that first E3 reveal were pretty over the top.

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
i just wish the new game didnt sound like torture porn. I hate playing a game that I feel really self-conscious playing anywhere but when I’m home alone. God forbid a roommate walks in and hears GASP MOAN SHRIEK from lara. “No, it’s tomb raider, I swear! No, that’s my wallet in my pocket, I swear!”

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: Banethulhu
item.description:
It’s a fun franchise, kinda like indiana jones but with a chick, I own tomb raider 1, 2 and chronicles for the ps1 and have beaten legends for the pc.

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: elevenbravo
item.description:
The new tomb raider looks amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
It is actually surprising how decent the games are, considering they could have just let Lara sell the games for them. Though I’ll admit I don’t have much to compare them to because lol console exclusives. Maybe I’m just missing out.

I’ve also tried the older games, but just like Maxey, I can’t beat them. I think it takes a completely different approach, cause the game mechanics have changed so much that all the puzzles seem counter intuitive to me now.

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I love Tomb Raider but I only beat the Crystal Dynamics’ games. I have played the original series’ games but never completed them.

I’m looking forward to the new reboot game.

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I liked Tomb Raider 2 when I was younger, haven’t played it in years though. I still have the PC version, lost my PSX one tho.

I remember being so impressed at the “lighting effects” they used for underwater effects at the time, i. e. a filter and some scrolling textures

and sharks.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=yKVletc36h8#t=110s

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
The only one of the series I’ve played for any length of time was Anniversary. It was pretty fun. Graphics hold up quite well and the controller controls are fully mappable according to “button” assignments, rather than having the Xbox 360 controller being the only option. That alone gives the game high marks in my book.

Read full topic

item.title: Who likes playing Tomb Raider?
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
I don’t have any, but they’re quite spectacular from what I understand.

I’ve heard that the games aren’t half bad either.

Read full topic

item.description:
Hello everyone! I like playing Tomb Raider, So since this is out in some months, I figured we needed a thread for it!
So what do you guys think about it? Does it need to be a game filled with a whole lot of mind-boggling puzzles like the previous games or an action game?
